> REE Chondrite (Boynton 1984)
139La 140Ce 141Pr 146Nd 31Pm 147Sm 153Eu 157Gd 159Tb 163Dy 165Ho 166Er 169Tm 172Yb 175Lu
.31 .808 .122 .6 1 .195 .0735 .2590 .0474 .322 .0718 .21 0.0324 .209 .0322

440 2430 1700 480 9900 110 300

* Additional definitions for the isotopes
C	12C	13C
Si	28Si	29Si
Ti	47Ti	49Ti
Cr	52Cr   	53Cr
Fe	56Fe	57Fe
Ga	69Ga	71Ga
Eu	151Eu	153Eu
Gd	157Gd	158Gd
Pb	204Pb	206Pb	207Pb	208Pb
